issue.title: ranges::rotate do not handle sized-but-not-sized-sentinel ranges correctly

discussion.p: These do not handle sized-but-not-sized-sentinel ranges correctly.
discussion.note: Kona 2025-11-03; approved by LWG. Status changed: New → Immediate.

li.pre: template<execution-policy Ep, sized-random-access-range R, class Comp = ranges::less, class Proj = identity> requires sortable<iterator_t<R>, Comp, Proj> borrowed_iterator_t<R> ranges::partial_sort(Ep&& exec, R&& r, iterator_t<R> middle, Comp comp = {}, Proj proj = {});

template<execution-policy Ep, sized-random-access-range R, class Comp = ranges::less, class Proj = identity> requires sortable<iterator_t<R>, Comp, Proj> borrowed_iterator_t<R> ranges::nth_element(Ep&& exec, R&& r, iterator_t<R> nth, Comp comp = {}, Proj proj = {});

template<execution-policy Ep, sized-random-access-range R, class Comp = ranges::less, class Proj = identity> requires sortable<iterator_t<R>, Comp, Proj> borrowed_iterator_t<R> ranges::inplace_merge(Ep&& exec, R&& r, iterator_t<R> middle, Comp comp = {}, Proj proj = {});
